content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.7 - Use of funds

State Regulations
(a) (1)

Of the funds the State receives under
section 401 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act for the first fiscal
year for which such funds are available, the State educational agency will use
for administration of the annual program plan not to exceed whichever is
greater: (i) five per centum of the amount so
received, excluding any part of such amount used for purposes of section
431(a)(3) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act or (ii) the amount it
received for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1973, for administration of the
programs referred to in section 421(b) and 431(b) of the Elementary and

Secondary Education Act and the remainder of such funds shall be made available
to local educational agencies to be used for the purposes of parts B and C, respectively of title IV of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act, and
(2)
of the funds the

State receives under section 401 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act
for fiscal years thereafter, it will use for administration of the annual
program plan not to exceed whichever is greater: (i) five per centum of the amount so
received, excluding any part of such amount used for purposes of section
431(a)(3) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act or (ii) $225,000, and
the remainder of such funds shall be made available to local educational
agencies to be used for purposes of parts B and C, respectively of title IV of
the Elementary and Secondary Education Act; (b) not less than 15 per centum of the amount
received pursuant to section 401(b) of the Elementary and Secondary Education

Act in any fiscal year (not including any amount used for purposes of section
431(a)(3) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act shall be used for
special programs or projects for the education of children with specific
learning disabilities and handicapped children, and
(c) not more than the greater of (1) 15 per
centum of the amount which such State receives pursuant to section 401(b) of
the Elementary and Secondary Education Act in any fiscal year, or (2) the
amount available by appropriation to such State in the fiscal year ending June
30, 1973, for purposes covered by section 431(a)(3) of the Elementary and

Secondary Education Act used for purposes of section 431(a)(3) of The

Elementary and Secondary Education Act (relating to strengthening State and
local education agencies). Notes
